PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableSegmentTypeContactWire
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of contact wires used in overhead contact line systems. This property set is applicable to a type or occurrence of IfcCableSegment with predefined type CONTACTWIRESEGMENT.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalExpansionCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Quantity characterizing the variation with thermodynamic temperature T of the distance l between two points of a body, under given conditions (IEC 113-04-27). The ratio is defined per Kelvin.

PropertyDef.Name: CurrentCarryingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum value of electric current which can be carried continuously by a conductor, a device or an apparatus, under specified conditions without its steady-state temperature exceeding a specified value. Based on IEC60826-11-13. NOTE: The temperature specified value is maximum Design Ambient Temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: DCResistance
PropertyDef.Definition: The resistance under direct current and 20 degrees centigrade.

PropertyDef.Name: MassPerLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Mass per length, i.e. mass of a beam with a unit length of extrusion. For example measured in kg/m.

PropertyDef.Name: YoungModulus
PropertyDef.Definition: A measure of the Young's modulus of elasticity of the material.

PropertyDef.Name: CrossSectionalArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Cross section area of the phase(s) lead(s).

PropertyDef.Name: TensileStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the ability to withstand breakage apart under applied force.
